post_title: How poverty rate is higher among immigrants if immigration requires proof of funds/income?

We‚Äôre not checking if you have enough money to buy a house, we‚Äôre checking if you have enough money to rent. Poverty rates for foreign born people are similar by tenure to UK born people, but higher for social renters than owner occupiers.¬†
